# üéº Welcome to J.S. Bach - A Life of Music!

![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0-blue.svg?cacheSeconds=2592000)
![issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/EzekielCarvalho/restaurant-land-europe)
![stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/EzekielCarvalho/restaurant-land-europe)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](#)

![J.S. Bach - A Life of Music banner](./bach_banner.png "Welcome to J.S. Bach - A Life of Music!")

> This is a much more serious project in memory of J.S. Bach, a great composer. It was made to commemorate Bach and his famous works of musical art that he created that have inspired many people. It features a unique hompage mentioning some details about Bach, a section on tour dates and locations by well known musicians.   

>The site includes an about page which gives more details about Bach. There is a unique store page included which contains an ecommerce feature that allows you to add products to your shopping cart, or remove them. The cart calculates the total for you.   

>The site does not include a stripe payment facility however, so once you click on the "purchase" button, the page acknowledges your purchase. The entire site is responsive so you don't have to worry about your site not working on smartphones and tablets. The overall site is user friendly.

![J.S. Bach - A Life of Music GIF](./bach_gif.gif "J.S. Bach - A Life of Music gif")

### üè† Visit the site here:    
[![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/J.S.%20Bach%20--A%20Life%20of%20Music-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://ezekielcarvalho.github.io/composer/index.html)

## Key Features

* Unique hompage mentioning details of Bach, section on tour dates and locations by well known musicians.   
* Unique store page included which contains an ecommerce feature that allows you to add products to your shopping cart, or remove them. The cart calculates the total for you.   
* User-friendly site
* HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript used
* Responsive site


## Instructions

To check this site, simply visit it at [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/J.S.%20Bach%20--A%20Life%20of%20Music-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://ezekielcarvalho.github.io/composer/index.html)
